title: i cant login to the game
body: i decided to make a new acc. at eu west server......i done it and logged in to my email but when i try to login to the game system replies me wrong id or password but am sure that they are right.....when i try to recover password the system tells me check ur email but i find nothing....pls help thx

replies.body: When you open the patcher, what region are you set on?  You may have another region selected, and would need to switch to EUW via the top right of the patcher.  Hopefuly, this will resolve the issue but let me know!
